item.description:
Want to record a question for the presidential candidates YouTube debate? Come join us at this event! Rich Laplante will record and upload our questions. More info about YouTube debate can be found here:http://www.youtube.co...

Weekly Training session for folks who have never canvassed before or who need a brief refresher.

Canvassing is an activity that involves going door-to-door and "interviewing" voters for Voter ID. It is used to identify voters who will be going to the polls on primary day for your candidate.

Meet at the Welcome Center, Exit 6E off rte 3 in Nashua at 7pm.
item.name: Canvassing Training Session and YouTube Debate Video Questions
